article:
An 'inverse relationship' is mathematically defined as an inverse
proportion Weisstein, Eric W. "Inversely Proportional." From MathWorld--A
Wolfram Web Resource.
http://mathworld.wolfram.com/InverselyProportional.html between two
mathematical variables. It means that one variable is directly proportional to
the inverse, or reciprocal, of the other. The two variables x and y are
inversely proportional if and only if y = kÃ·x for some constant k.
